name: The Peasant
description:
In here, you need to find the treasure chest for win, You play as a medieval peasant. It's 2.5D game with 8 level. If you push the wooden box, the player will respawn. just be careful when walking the slippery ice, moving platform and the rock obstacle.

Controls: WASD / Arrow Key (⬅⬆⬇➡) for walk and Space Bar to jump.

Music by freesound.org
